channel.title: A weapon for only ONE person
channel.description: Hey I want to make a weapon that k0s things with one hit and So I am the only single person that can use it my name is Kyle ingame

item.title: A weapon for only ONE person
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

Tell you what go look for “pk planet” make sure its his 2nd one not his first by Bashar. In his client.java look for “bashar” and you will see after looking for a while something like only the owner can were this armor. WARNING! You probably get a warning from your anti virus about the auto restarter don’t worry it doesn’t do anything to you computer just deleate it. But yeah that code will tell ya how to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: A weapon for only ONE person
